newsitem.title: USA: PharmaPrint Inc sees possible FY98 profit.
newsitem.headline: PharmaPrint Inc sees possible FY98 profit.

text.p: PharmaPrint Inc on Thursday said it is in contract discussions that could lead to profitability in fiscal 1998.
The company, which makes pharmaceutical versions of herbal medicines, said its goal of reaching profitability in fiscal 1998 requires at least two agreements in the next 12 months.
The company said it is "well advanced" in discussions on a first contract and is in talks that could produce a second license during the next 12 months.

"We estimate that these contracts could yield $14 million in revenues during the fiscal year ended March 31, 1998. This is certainly not guaranteed, but we believe it is a reasonable goal," the company said.
On Thursday the company said it produced no revenues for the quarter ended September 30, which it said saw losses of $0.46 per share.
